content.en: Single-photon 3D Imaging: Scientists are exploring the capabilities of single-photon imaging technology for achieving high-precision 3D imaging over long distances. They are using various algorithms, such as total variation restoration optimization, modified total variation regularization, and bespoke algorithms for restoration of multilayered 3D images, to reconstruct depth and intensity profiles from single-photon detection data. These algorithms enable real-time 3D reconstruction of dynamic scenes, even in low-light conditions and through atmospheric obscurants, making single-photon imaging a promising tool for a wide range of applications.
content.da: Single-photon 3D-billeddannelse: Forskere undersøger mulighederne ved single-photon billeddannelsesteknologi til at opnå højpræcisions 3D-billeddannelse over lange afstande. De bruger forskellige algoritmer, som total variations restorationsoptimering, modificeret total variations regulering og skræddersyede algoritmer til restaurering af flerlags 3D-billeder, til at rekonstruere dybde- og intensitetsprofiler fra single-photon detektionsdata. Disse algoritmer muliggør realtids 3D-rekonstruktion af dynamiske scener, selv under lavlysforhold og gennem atmosfæriske forhindringer, hvilket gør single-photon billeddannelse til et lovende værktøj for en bred vifte af anvendelser.
